Choose a green venue: Look for a wedding venue that has already implemented eco-friendly practices, such as using renewable energy sources or reducing waste. This will help to minimize your impact on the environment.
Use sustainable materials: Opt for materials that are sustainable and biodegradable, such as recycled paper or bamboo, for invitations, decorations, and other items...
Choose locally sourced and organic food: Select food that is locally sourced and organic to reduce the carbon footprint of transportation and the use of pesticides..

Use energy-efficient lighting: Use energy-efficient lighting, such as LED lights, to reduce energy consumption. You can also use candles or other natural light sources to create a warm and romantic atmosphere.
Consider carpooling or public transportation: Encourage your guests to carpool or use public transportation to get to the wedding, which will help to reduce the carbon footprint of transportation.
